tms.name: Headbutt
tms.effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

tms.name: Rest
tms.effect: User sleeps for two turns, completely healing itself.

tms.name: Light Screen
tms.effect: Reduces damage from special attacks by 50% for five turns.

tms.name: Protect
tms.effect: Prevents any attacks targeted at the user from striking, for the duration of the turn. It has priority +4 so will activate before most other moves.

tms.name: Substitute
tms.effect: Transfers 1/4 of the user's max HP into a doll, protecting the user from further damage or status changes until it breaks.

tms.name: Reflect
tms.effect: Reduces damage from physical attacks by half.

tms.name: Facade
tms.effect: Deals damage, and hits with double power (140) if the user is burned, poisoned or paralyzed.

tms.name: Toxic
tms.effect: Badly poisons the target, inflicting more damage every turn.

tms.name: Outrage
tms.effect: The user of Outrage attacks for 2-3 turns, during which it cannot switch out, and then becomes confused.

tms.name: Solar Beam
tms.effect: The user of Solar Beam will absorb light on the first turn. On the second turn, Solar Beam deals damage.

tms.name: Sludge Bomb
tms.effect: Deals damage and has a 30% chance of poisoning the target.

tms.name: Mega Drain
tms.effect: Heals the user by half the damage inflicted.
